item.title: E-commerce website - Planning Phase
item.description: Hello everyone! Today I spent most of my day studying for AZ-900, I am following a learning path my company offers so that when the time comes I can take the exam and get certified. I am also thinking of creating a project using all the technologies I am currently studying: Angular, Spring, MySQL. I am mostly still planning it, I think building an e-commerce application will be very useful to showcase my skills.
